name: Harvard University
description: One of the world's most prestigious universities offering diverse programs across disciplines.
largeDescription: Harvard University, established in 1636, is the oldest institution of higher education in the United States. It offers a wide range of undergraduate, graduate, and professional programs, and is renowned for its research output, faculty expertise, and global influence.

name: Stanford University
description: Leading private research university known for innovation and entrepreneurship.
largeDescription: Stanford University, located in California's Silicon Valley, is known for its academic strength, proximity to tech giants, and cutting-edge research. It excels in engineering, computer science, and business education.

name: MIT
description: Global leader in science, engineering, and technological innovation.
largeDescription: The Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT) is renowned worldwide for its rigorous curriculum, world-class faculty, and innovation-driven research environment in science, technology, and engineering.

name: University of California, Berkeley
description: Top public research university with a strong reputation in science and technology.
largeDescription: UC Berkeley is a leading public university known for academic excellence, diverse programs, and commitment to public service. It has produced numerous Nobel laureates and influential thinkers.

name: University of Michigan
description: Top-ranked public university known for research, sports, and student life.
largeDescription: The University of Michigan offers a wide range of programs and is well known for its vibrant campus life, research excellence, and alumni network. It is a top choice among public institutions.

name: Yale University
description: Prestigious Ivy League institution with strong programs in arts and humanities.
largeDescription: Yale University, founded in 1701, is one of the oldest Ivy League schools. It is known for its excellence in liberal arts education, law, and its world-class faculty and alumni network.

name: Princeton University
description: Top Ivy League school with a strong liberal arts and engineering focus.
largeDescription: Princeton University, established in 1746, is a prestigious Ivy League school known for its small class sizes, renowned faculty, and commitment to undergraduate education and fundamental research.

name: Columbia University
description: Ivy League university located in the heart of New York City.
largeDescription: Columbia University is a prestigious research institution known for its urban campus, global programs, and strengths in journalism, business, and international affairs.

name: University of Chicago
description: Highly regarded research university known for economics and liberal arts.
largeDescription: The University of Chicago has a legacy of academic rigor and inquiry. It's especially known for its programs in economics, political science, and philosophy.

name: California Institute of Technology
description: Elite science and engineering school with cutting-edge research.
largeDescription: Caltech is a small, highly focused institution known for excellence in science and engineering. It has a strong research culture and a close-knit academic community.

name: Duke University
description: Private research university with strong programs in medicine and public policy.
largeDescription: Duke University offers a wide range of undergraduate and graduate programs. It is known for its medical center, research productivity, and strong student engagement.

name: University of Pennsylvania
description: Ivy League university with a strong focus on business and medicine.
largeDescription: The University of Pennsylvania, home to the renowned Wharton School, offers interdisciplinary education and a strong emphasis on research and healthcare innovation.

name: Northwestern University
description: Top-tier private university known for journalism, business, and research.
largeDescription: Northwestern University offers comprehensive programs across arts, sciences, and professional studies. Its Medill School of Journalism is world-renowned.

name: University of California, Los Angeles
description: Public university known for arts, entertainment, and research excellence.
largeDescription: UCLA is a major public research university offering diverse programs in arts, sciences, and professional fields. It has a strong global reputation and vibrant campus life.

name: Johns Hopkins University
description: Leading private university known for medicine and public health.
largeDescription: Johns Hopkins is a leader in medical research and healthcare education. It is also renowned for its programs in international relations and engineering.

name: Brown University
description: Ivy League university with an open curriculum and strong liberal arts foundation.
largeDescription: Brown University emphasizes student-driven education through its unique open curriculum. It's known for liberal arts, social sciences, and a collaborative campus culture.

name: Cornell University
description: Ivy League university with strengths in agriculture, business, and engineering.
largeDescription: Cornell University is known for its diverse academic offerings, including specialized colleges in agriculture and hotel management, and a strong commitment to public engagement.

name: Rice University
description: Private university with strong programs in engineering and natural sciences.
largeDescription: Rice University combines the advantages of a small university with strong research output. It’s highly respected for its STEM programs and collaborative culture.

name: University of Notre Dame
description: Private Catholic university with a focus on liberal arts and values-based education.
largeDescription: Notre Dame is a nationally recognized Catholic research university known for its commitment to liberal education, strong business programs, and a global alumni network.

name: Vanderbilt University
description: Private research university with a focus on medicine, education, and the arts.
largeDescription: Vanderbilt University blends rigorous academics with a vibrant social culture. It is known for its medical and education programs and strong research initiatives.

name: Harvard University
description: One of the world's most prestigious universities offering diverse programs across disciplines.
largeDescription: Harvard University, established in 1636, is the oldest institution of higher education in the United States. It offers a wide range of undergraduate, graduate, and professional programs, and is renowned for its research output, faculty expertise, and global influence.

name: University of Oxford
description: The oldest university in the English-speaking world with excellence in research and teaching.
largeDescription: The University of Oxford is a historic institution known for its rigorous academic programs, world-class faculty, and state-of-the-art research facilities. It has produced numerous Nobel laureates and world leaders over its centuries-long history.

name: University of Toronto
description: Canada's leading institution known for innovation and diverse cultural environment.
largeDescription: The University of Toronto is a globally recognized institution offering top-tier education in various fields. Its multicultural environment and innovative research make it a preferred choice for students worldwide.

name: University of Melbourne
description: Australia's leading university known for research excellence and quality education.
largeDescription: The University of Melbourne is a prestigious Australian institution offering a wide variety of programs. It is highly regarded for its research contributions and strong industry partnerships.

name: ETH Zurich
description: Swiss Federal Institute of Technology known for science, technology and engineering programs.
largeDescription: ETH Zurich is one of the leading universities in Europe for science and technology. It is renowned for its cutting-edge research facilities and strong emphasis on innovation.

name: National University of Singapore
description: Leading global university centered in Asia offering a global approach to education and research.
largeDescription: The National University of Singapore (NUS) is Asia's top university with a strong emphasis on research and innovation. It provides students with opportunities to engage in global collaborations.

name: National University of Singapore
description: Leading global university centered in Asia offering a global approach to education and research.
largeDescription: The National University of Singapore (NUS) is Asia's top university with a strong emphasis on research and innovation. It provides students with opportunities to engage in global collaborations.

largeDescription: The National University of Singapore (NUS) is Asia's top university with a strong emphasis on research and innovation. It provides students with opportunities to engage in global collaborations.
